rooms.description: A welcoming space that provides natural light with a Vastu-compliant entry facing the northeast.
An open, airy living area designed for family gatherings, with eco-friendly energy-efficient windows and sustainable materials.
A compact yet modern kitchen integrated into the living space, equipped with energy-saving appliances and natural light sources.
Functional guest bathroom ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.details: Main entrance aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

openings.description: Large windows providing natural lighting and ventilation, ensuring eco-friendly design.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with east-facing balcony adhering to Vastu guidelines. Includes built-in eco-friendly storage and energy-efficient fixtures.
Second master bedroom on the upper level with a north-facing balcony ensuring calmness and minimal heat exposure, in line with eco-friendly practices.
Third bedroom designed with south-facing window to maximize morning sunlight. A balcony is provided for relaxation and natural ventilation.
A dedicated home theater area on the first floor, designed with sound insulation using sustainable materials to reduce energy consumption while ensuring a high-quality viewing experience.
Spacious balcony adjoining bedroom 3, offering outdoor living space with eco-friendly materials.

openings.details: East-facing balcony providing morning light and natural ventilation.

openings.description: South-facing window designed to allow ample sunlight and improve energy efficiency.
